originalText.text: Truly impeccable service, I dropped off a sweater and dress Saturday for mending and got a text Sunday evening they were done. The handiwork is perfect and they saved these garments that I had thought would be pretty difficult to fix. My sweater was perfectly re-knit and I can‚Äôt even see where the threads started to come undone. I‚Äôm amazed! I‚Äôd trust them with anything!

originalText.text: The team here is amazing! Brought a bridesmaid dress to be tailored one week and the dress was treated with care, fitted perfectly (they had to remove the zipper and rework the bust entirely), and it was ready 4 days early! Super reasonable price and conveniently located. Thank you!!!

originalText.text: Super fast and awesome quality! And they are so friendly! Very fair price. Sent silk dress for length alteration on Monday, got message for picking up on Wednesday.

originalText.text: Took three pairs of jeans in to be tailored at the waist. They now fit perfectly, and at an affordable price!!! Amazing service thank you so much
